comments.body: Wondering if it would make sense to link from the dart docs of all these generated maps here and in the previous file to https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/master/dev/tools/gen_keycodes/README.md. That way, people who look at this thing on docs.flutter.io have a chance of finding out where the "magic"numbers in this map are coming from.

Well, except that I really don't want them to try and unpack the magic numbers: they're supposed to be fully opaque.  The only time you should need to understand that is if you're porting Flutter to a new platform.
